skillTree.localised_description: The Fly Lord and his devotees despise Tzeentch, for his obsession with schemes and trickery are the polar opposite of Nurgle's delight in slow, musty stagnation.

effects.description: Melee attack: +10 when fighting against Tzeentchian factions
Weapon strength: +15% when fighting against Tzeentchian factions

skillTree.localised_description: Anything fired at this vile Nurglish servant's immense girth must penetrate many folds of sweaty fat before they even have the slightest chance of piercing his flesh.

Nurgle’s cankerous plagues do not merely infest the physical form, they also run virulently rampant throughout a being’s soul, destroying his sense of self and moral direction as thoroughly as they corrupt his fevered body.

effects.description:
Chance of a plague spreading: +50%
	(all units in army)

skillTree.localised_description: A skilled observer can read flaked and crumbled trail soul-stuff as it departs the mortal coil, adding a portion of the spirit’s strength to his.

effects.description:
Ability: "Reckoner of Mortality"
	(all units in army)

ui_effects.localised_text: Effect intensity increases with each kill made by the unit.

skillTree.localised_description: Nurglings attend the Tallyman’s every need, providing the parchment, operating the death’s head abacus, excreting the ink for the quill pens and even defending Epidemius from harm should a foolish enemy venture too close.

effects.description:
Ability: "The Maggot King" for Nurglings units
	(all units in army)

target_if: Unit is a Lord or Hero

effects.description:
Melee defence: +5 for Nurglings units
	(all units in army)

skillTree.localised_description: From his perch, Epidemius surveys the thrift and splendour of Nurgle’s creations, making note of casualties and infection rates as well as secondary symptoms such as unusual colourations and odours. This information, properly collated and distilled, is of incredible value to Father Nurgle.
As an offer of thanks, Epidemius’ entourage strike bells and gongs when such a soul finally succumbs, ushering the tainted spirit into Nurgle’s paternal and welcoming embrace.

ui_effects.localised_text: Activates when an enemy unit is destroyed within 30 metres

skillTree.localised_description: Mouldering decay seeps from Epidemius as he is carried about, infecting all who even catch the merest glimpse of his presence.
The Warriors of Chaos are the playthings of Gods and given many gifts, including formidable fighting skills.
Some creatures charge home with such fury that the very ground shakes beneath their feet.
Creatures with tough hides or some kind of natural armour are tough nuts to crack - even a powerful attack may fall foul of their thick-skin.
Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, it’s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.
A deadly blade is especially lethal when in the hands of this master death-maker, killer and slaughterer!
From one bloodied, lifeless corpse to the next, this one is always looking for the next adversary to best.
Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.
The scars on this storied warrior reveal a veteran of many battles, a being not easy to kill and one worthy of respect and fear.
The iron will and indomitable presence of this leader ensures their followers remain steadfast when facing peril.
A blade that sings in defence will not let its wielder be penetrated.
The war is endless. The cycle of charging, clashing, and bloody hand-to-hand fighting is without end. It will never stop.
This champion extols discipline and fear away from the battlefield as much as on it.

effects.description: Training action: Unit experience gain is increased by an additional 10%
Training action: Unit experience gain is increased by an additional 20%
Training action: Unit experience gain is increased by an additional 30%

skillTree.localised_description: The sight of this warrior, their stature, import or infamy, can have a calming effect.

effects.description: Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 1
Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 2
Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 3

skillTree.localised_description: "If they know I'm coming then more's the better!"

effects.description: Assault Garrison action: Additional 5% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 30% casualties inflicted

skillTree.localised_description: A skilled assassin is a cold-hearted killer and merciless murderer.
Lying in wait, experienced and patient, striking when the foe least expects.

effects.description: Assault Units action: Additional 3% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 8% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted

skillTree.localised_description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.

Daemonic units cannot be routed, but take damage when their Leadership is low.
	
	Daemonic units also have:
	Physical Resistance
	 Fear and Terror Immunity
This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Epidemius is Nurgle’s chosen Tallyman, one of the seven Proctors of Pestilence and the cataloguer of all the Plaguelord’s diseases.

ui_effects.localised_text: Effect intensity increases with each kill made by the unit.
